```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(choroplethr)
library
```

```{r, results='hide', echo=FALSE}
unique_counties <-unique(floor(tract_map$region/1000000))

mdfami_map <- data.frame("region"=x$tractid, "value"=x$mdfami0016)
mdfami <- tract_choropleth(
  mdfami_map,
  state_name="new york",
  county_zoom=unique_counties,
  title="% Change in Median Family Income 2000 to 2016"
)

rent_map <- data.frame("region"=x$tractid, "value"=x$mdrent0016)
rent <- tract_choropleth(
  rent_map,
  state_name="new york",
  county_zoom=unique_counties,
  title="% Change in Rent 2000 to 2016"
)

nhw_map <- data.frame("region"=x$tractid, "value"=x$NHW0016)
nhw <- tract_choropleth(
  nhw_map,
  state_name="new york",
  county_zoom=unique_counties,
  title="% Change in Non-Hispanic White Pop. 2000 to 2016"
)
```
